promptText:
Verbavid project report for BCA (DS & AI) degree.
Akansha Jaiswal's project at Digipodium.
Project fulfills BCA degree requirements.
Focuses on Verbavid's needs, challenges, and solutions.
Includes feasibility study, system design, and testing.
UML diagrams illustrate high-level design.
Data dictionary details low-level design.
Project conclusion and future scope outlined.
